name: Fuerza Mágica Intergaláctica (mauriciotolosa)
description:
Intergalactic Wizard Force, translated into Latin American Spanish by Mauricio Tolosa (me :O) for LocJAM 5 (My first LocJAM ever :D)

If I had more time I would have made a complete dub but I can't do it being only me and having only 2 days before the deadline (They are actually 3 but I forgot Locjam started on may 5th lmao) so it's only my translation to Latin American Spanish and the awesome main theme sung and mixed by me as well. Enjoy!

Little details that I included in the translation:

Since the flat guy is Australian af, I decided to give him Spanish (Spain) dialogue. And I decided to make Maria Argentinian because why not. Some good representation for my country and a fun interpretation (and translation!) of some of these accents and personalities in the vast (allegedly) universe of Intergalactic Wizard Force, or as I like to call it in Spanish, FUERZA MÁGICA INTERGALÁCTICA

I believe in Doorian supremacy 10/10
